   Tessa  Weinberg
   By Tessa Weinberg October 24, 2018

Burger King doesn't use horse meat in burgers like viral post claims

   A viral blog post claims that fast food chain Burger King has "recently
   confessed" that horse meat has been used in its burgers and Whoppers.

Our ruling

   Not once in its statement did Burger King say, as this article in Everyday
   Useful Info states, that it was using horse meat in its burgers and
   whoppers.
